title: 01. Environment Setup
description: Configuring your workspace for script development.
content: Before coding, ensure your executor supports standard libraries like Bit32 and Debug.
code:
-- Identify your software
print("Loaded Uno.exe Environment")
local exec = identifyexecutor() or "Unknown"
warn("Current Executor: " .. exec)

title: 02. Remote Security Bypass
description: How to bypass basic remote event rate limiting.
content: Some games track how fast you fire remotes. Use task.wait() to stay under the radar.

title: 03. Instance Caching
description: Optimizing your scripts for high-performance games.
content: Use variables to store services instead of calling GetService repeatedly.
code:
local Players = game:GetService('Players')
local LP = Players.LocalPlayer

print("Welcome, " .. LP.Name)
